name: Gupta's Forest
description:
Welcome to the forest  

Your car has broken down in the middle of the night, and you must go find the pieces to fix it. But beware, there is a creature in the woods. Stay low and keep out of sight. When Gupta sees you he will let out a loud growl, and your light will turn red.

The game was made in Unreal Engine 4 by a solo dev. This was my first game so if you experience any problems or glitches please let me know in the comments. Thank you!
